data.name: Afterslave
data.detailed_description:
This is a story about a boy that have committed a mistake. Or this isn't a mistake? You will decide on your's own.
Select different dialogue answers and see how events are described. There is 4 endings, each of which is depended on your answer.
data.about_the_game:
This is a story about a boy that have committed a mistake. Or this isn't a mistake? You will decide on your's own.
Select different dialogue answers and see how events are described. There is 4 endings, each of which is depended on your answer.
data.short_description: Afterslave is a short visual novel about a boy that have reached culmination of his life in a totalitaristic country

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Almost any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Almost any (must support OpenGL 1.20)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Almost any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Almost any (must support OpenGL 1.20)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Afterslave contains a little about self-harm and textual descriptions of violence
